verses.verse: [Put] the trumpet <WH7782> to your lips! <WH2441> Like an eagle <WH5404> [the enemy comes] against <WH5921> the house <WH1004> of the Lord, <WH3068> Because <WH3282> they have transgressed <WH5674> My covenant, <WH1285> And rebelled <WH6586> against <WH5921> My law. <WH8451>
They cry <WH2199> out to Me, "My God, <WH430> we of Israel <WH3478> know <WH3045> Thee!"
Israel <WH3478> has rejected <WH2186> the good; <WH9185> The enemy <WH340> will pursue <WH7291> him.

They have set <WH4427> up kings, <WH4427> but not by Me; They have appointed <WH8323> princes, <WH8323> but I did not know <WH3045> [it.] With their silver <WH3701> and gold <WH2091> they have made <WH6213> idols <WH6091> for themselves, That they might be cut <WH3772> off. <WH3772>

He has rejected <WH2186> your calf, <WH5695> O Samaria, <WH8111> saying, "My anger <WH639> burns <WH2734> against them!" How <WH4970> long <WH5704> will they be incapable <WH3808> <WH3201> of innocence <WH5356>?

For from Israel <WH3478> is even this! <WH1931> A craftsman <WH2796> made <WH6213> it, so it is not God; <WH430> Surely <WH3588> the calf <WH5695> of Samaria <WH8111> will be broken <WH7616> to pieces. <WH7616>

For they sow <WH2232> the wind, <WH7307> And they reap <WH7114> the whirlwind. <WH5492> The standing <WH7054> grain <WH7054> has <WH369> no <WH369> heads; <WH6780> It yields <WH6213> no <WH1097> grain. <WH7058> Should <WH194> it yield, <WH6213> strangers <WH2114> would swallow <WH1104> it up.
Israel <WH3478> is swallowed <WH1104> up; They are now <WH6258> among the nations <WH1471> Like a vessel <WH3627> in which no <WH369> one <WH369> delights. <WH2656>
For they have gone <WH5927> up to Assyria, <WH804> [Like] a wild <WH6501> donkey <WH6501> all alone; <WH909> Ephraim <WH669> has hired <WH8566> lovers. <WH158>

Even <WH1571> though <WH3588> they hire <WH8566> [allies] among the nations, <WH1471> Now <WH6258> I will gather <WH6908> them up; And they will begin <WH2490> to diminish <WH4592> Because <WH4480> of the burden <WH4853> of the king <WH4428> of princes. <WH8269>
Since <WH3588> Ephraim <WH669> has multiplied <WH7235> altars <WH4196> for sin, <WH2398> They have become <WH1961> altars <WH4196> of sinning <WH2398> for him.
Though I wrote <WH3789> for him ten <WH7239> thousand <WH7239> [precepts] of My law, <WH8451> They are regarded <WH2803> as a strange <WH2114> thing. <WH2114>

As for My sacrificial <WH2077> gifts, <WH1890> They sacrifice <WH2076> the flesh <WH1320> and eat <WH398> [it,] [But] the Lord <WH3068> has taken <WH7521> no <WH3808> delight <WH7521> in them. Now <WH6258> He will remember <WH2142> their iniquity, <WH5771> And punish <WH6485> [them] for their sins; <WH9128> They will return <WH7725> to Egypt. <WH4714>

For Israel <WH3478> has forgotten <WH7911> his Maker <WH6213> and built <WH1129> palaces; <WH1964> And Judah <WH3063> has multiplied <WH7235> fortified <WH1219> cities, <WH5892> But I will send <WH7971> a fire <WH784> on its cities <WH5892> that it may consume <WH398> its palatial <WH759> dwellings. <WH759>
